definition: to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
variant of 構|构[gou4]/(Tw) (coll.) variant of 夠|够[gou4]/to reach by stretching
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: He is always looking for composition in predecessors.
sentences.chinese: 他总是前人的画作里寻找构图。

sentences.english: Use the organization chart to identify additional personnel for interviews.
sentences.chinese: 使用组织结构图来确定要访谈的其他人员。

sentences.english: The previous homogeneous illustration depicts a simple two instance cluster.
sentences.chinese: 前面的同构图例描述了一个简单的两个实例集群。

sentences.english: Can you explain why the flags help or hinder good composition?
sentences.chinese: 你能解释为什么这些旗帮助或者损害了好的构图吗？

sentences.english: He photographs any scene that composes well.
sentences.chinese: 他把任何构图美好的风景都拍摄下来。

sentences.english: The architecture diagram includes an icon for network ports.
sentences.chinese: 架构图包含了网络端口的图标。

sentences.english: The article points out the importance of realizing the Multi-layer line in structure figure of style pattern.
sentences.chinese: 指出开发服装款式平面结构图中多层线型的重要性。

sentences.english: Su embroidery is famous for its delicate workmanship, beautiful designs, and tasteful colors.
sentences.chinese: 苏绣因其工艺精细，构图和色彩美丽高雅而闻名。

sentences.english: Frame the detail in the center of the photo, and then on the edge.
sentences.chinese: 将细部构图在相片的中心点，接着再试试边缘。

sentences.english: Here are two boys wrestling down at the bottom of the frame, beautifully composed.
sentences.chinese: 在画面下方有两名正在摔角的男孩，构图很美。

sentences.english: The principle of capacitance pressure transmitter is shown in the figure.
sentences.chinese: 图中为电容式压力变送器的原理结构图。

sentences.english: Composition and close-up are the two important aspects in the arrangement of film tableaux.
sentences.chinese: 构图和特写是电影画面处理的两个重要方面。

sentences.english: Nanolithography technology is one of the main areas of nanostructure research.
sentences.chinese: 电子束曝光机是纳米构图技术的重要途径之一。

sentences.english: In the composition the child draws and the farmer draws both use the form of the plane composition.
sentences.chinese: 构图上儿童画和农民画都采用平面构图的形式。

sentences.english: In the composition the child draws and the farmer draws both use the form of the plane composition.
sentences.chinese: 构图上儿童画和农民画都采用平面构图的形式。

sentences.english: Construct a diorama for any section in the book.
sentences.chinese: 构建这本书中任何一章节的结构图。

definition: freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
line drawing in traditional ink and brush style/simple and straightforward style of writing
